name: Marble Train
description:
Made for the "Stop Waiting for Godot" jam

The longer you get, the more parts of the stage appear. (unlocks are at 20 and 50 marbles. Then you get no more space!)

Controls:

  • Steer: A/D or Left/Right or Left Stick
  • Speed up: W or Up or Right Trigger
  • Change Camera: Tab or Y Button/Triangle

Still a bit rough but, for 2 days work in a game engine I had only ever used for a couple of hours before, I'm happy with this :)

Note: I have no idea if the macOS or Linux builds work, sorry!
